item.title: We are looking for an actor from Nepal to create 3 short videos in Nepali language. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an actor from Nepal to create 3 short videos of 1-1.30 minutes each in Nepali language on how you play and win in gaming apps. The video does not require editing or special skills. We value sincerity and naturalness of emotions. The point of the video is that the entire gameplay is pre-recorded by us, you will need to play this video on your phone and demonstrate the game by filming yourself in the process. The video must be filmed according to the script that we have prepared.
I will send you video samples (to give you a better idea of ​​what it will look like)

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:10 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Voice Acting, Video Production, Audio Editing
Skills: Voice Acting, Video Production, Audio Editing
Country: Hungary
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Video Ideas - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative individual to help us come up with video ideas for our YouTube channel in the documentary/commentary niche(channel example; Moon, Pexto).
The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of the target audience and be able to brainstorm unique concepts that will engage and captivate viewers. This role requires excellent research and analytical skills to identify trending topics, relevant issues, and compelling stories that align with our channel's vision. The candidate should also possess strong communication skills to effectively articulate their ideas and collaborate with the content creation team. If you have a passion for storytelling and can think outside the box, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Videographer Needed for Online Pet Boutique Ad Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are an online pet boutique specializing in luxury and unique toys, clothes, and accessories for dogs and cats. We are looking for an experienced videographer to create an ad video for social media and Google ads. The video should capture the essence of our brand and showcase our high-quality products in an engaging and visually appealing way.

    Responsibilities include:
    - Collaborating with our team to develop a creative concept for the video
    - Shooting and editing high-quality footage that highlights our products
    - Adding appropriate music and sound effects to enhance the video
    - Ensuring the video meets the specifications of social media and Google ads platforms

    Required skills:
    - Videography and video editing
    - Storyboarding and creative concept development
    - Proficiency with video editing software
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project that will require approximately 1 to 3 months to complete. We are seeking an intermediate-level videographer with a portfolio demonstrating previous experience in creating engaging ad videos for e-commerce brands.

    If you are passionate about pets and have the skills necessary to create compelling ad videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work along with your proposal.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:02 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Greece
click to apply

item.description:

- Scripts around 2500-3000 words

- Open to collaboration, and improvement.
- Professional & Positive Attitude
- Fast response, turnaround time, and understanding of client needs.

item.title: Video Reviewer - Test and Evaluate Online Websites in Make Money Category - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a keen eye for detail and love uncovering the truth? Are you comfortable on camera? We're looking for a video reviewer in the US to join our team and create informative reviews of online and offline earning platforms.

In this role, you'll:

- Sign up for popular platforms like Swagbucks, User Interviews, Instacart and more to test your detective skills.
- Earn real money by completing surveys, following instructions on microtask platforms, and trying out gig economy jobs (keep these earnings – they're yours!)
- Test the app for around 5 hours
- Document your experience: record yourself cashing out and completing tasks.
- Become a star! Create engaging video reviews which will be edited by professional video editor (no prior video experience needed, we'll provide training!)

Why You'll Love Working Here:

- Flexible hours: work whenever you want, wherever you want as long as it's in USA.
- Competitive pay: earn $75 per video review (expenses covered if any), plus keep your earnings from the app that you have tested (up to $15 extra per hour!)
- Be a part of something bigger: your reviews help others make informed decisions online.
- Focus on your performance, not editing: Don't worry about perfecting your video editing skills - our team will handle the post-production magic!

Ready to join the team?

If you're a detail-oriented individual with a passion for sharing your discoveries, we want to hear from you! Apply today!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 28, 2024 09:45 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Skills: Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant for Video Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We’re currently a team of two specialising in TikTok content creation and are searching for a talented VA to join our team.

We’re looking for someone who can support us by following an already-established template and SOP to create short-form video content using CapCut.

Must haves:
- Must have access to CapCut
- Be somewhat familiar with the software
- Training on using CapCut can be provided

If interested, please share details about your experience with examples of clients you’ve worked for and the duties you performed for them, respond with the word ‘CapCut’ as the first word in the application.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:CapCut, File Management, Video Editing
Skills: CapCut, File Management, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Video Montage using exisiting clips - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a freelancer to complete video editing work, which I estimate will span approximately one week. The project entails producing 30 short video clips, each lasting one minute or less, in both portrait and landscape formats.

To proceed, please provide examples of your previous work for my review. Additionally, I will require a mock-up based on the video directives and clips, which will serve as a template for creating the initial video. I will also share a sample video to illustrate the desired style and format for the project.




Posted On: June 28, 2024 09:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, TikTok Video, Wedding & Event Video, Audio Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Transition, Social Video Enhancement, Video Enhancement, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Audition, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Creative Cloud, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Event Highlights Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
